entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
